postExert.title: Developer’s business
postExert.author: Akseli Virtanen
postExert.exert: Software development is where digital business design meets the real world. Understanding the connection yields better results, both in business and software.

postExert.title: Redesigning Remote Office
postExert.author: Sami Häkkinen
postExert.exert: Remote office has grown to be an integral part of our company culture. However, after running it for two years, we realized it needed some tweaking.

postExert.title: We want more women in tech!
postExert.author: Tuuli Hirvonen
postExert.exert: Technology companies need diversity more than ever, as diverse thinking gives birth to the best products and solutions.

postExert.title: Raw, real, and relaxed – Introducing our new remote office concept
postExert.author: Frantic
postExert.exert: We decided to encourage our employees to work from wherever they want.

postExert.title: The Frantic value journey – A travelogue
postExert.author: Michael Dlugosch
postExert.exert: Any company that starts its journey with selecting their values, has one million templates to choose from. Read how we set out on our value journey.

postExert.title: From site builder trainee to superior role
postExert.author: Frantic
postExert.exert: Meet Oscar, our developer, who's never satisfied until he knows why something in code works or does not work.

postExert.title: Going beyond the brief
postExert.author: Frantic
postExert.exert: Meet our Strategy Director Michael who thinks that technology without people would be boring and who envisions a future that’s radically different from the past

postExert.title: Introducing Frantic values
postExert.author: Sami Häkkinen
postExert.exert: Nearly every company has values and it claims to live by them. Selecting meaningful values is one thing, but really embodying them is completely another.

postExert.title: On programming and being a programmer
postExert.author: Frantic
postExert.exert: To celebrate International Programmer’s Day, a bunch of our developers shared their stories on how did they begin to code and what drives them forward.

postExert.title: Frantic migrates all client sites to use HTTPS
postExert.author: Frantic – News
postExert.exert: Frantic migrates all client sites to use HTTPS at no extra cost.
